name: Inflatable Snorkel Vest Adult Snorkeling Jackets Free Diving Swimming Safety Load Up to 220 Ibs
short_description: Airbag Main Material: Polyester 60% (outer) + PVC 40% (inner)
Imported
Lyuwpes Snorkeling Vest: small footprint, large buoyancy (from 80 to 220 lbs) while snorkeling; fluorescence colors provide excellent visibility, great for learners & swimmers
Fast Inflation, Fast Deflation: snorkel vest supports the body, just right fully inflated without the need of excess air, convenient mouthpiece location

Horse Collar Style Over The Neck: all snorkel vests and zippered jackets on the market adopt this design style, simple to put on and take off, very comfortable without skin abrasions, fitting well for most adults (not all adults)
Adjustable Waist & Crotch Straps: latch straps vertically and horizontally, providing a secure and worry free, easy pinch buckles for fast removal
Flexible, Lightweight & Compact: easy to pack, a little smart companion for journey (bonus mesh bag included)

Proper Use & Warm Warning: Lyuwpes inflatable snorkeling vest is not certified as a professional life jacket or life preserver and is just designed for leisure and other low-impact water activities. Prior to each use safe, take a test to make sure inflatable snorkel vest is inflated and deflated properly. In short, follow the buddy rule, never swim alone and always remember that do not rush to use it anywhere and anytime.

name: Airhead Women's CAMO COOL Kwik-Dry Neolite Flex Life Jacket, US Coast Guard Approved
short_description: US COAST GUARD APPROVED – this personal flotation device meets USCG requirements for a Type III Life Jacket. Closed sides, multiple adjustable belt closures for secure fit for water sports enthusiasts

COMFORT - Less bulky design for use when quick response is likely, offers a larger range of motion making it a favorite for water sports. Closed sides, multiple external straps with quick release buckles keep the life jacket securely in place. This life jacket follows the sizing determined by the USGC, please reference the size chart image
MATERIAL – Lightweight PE foam provides excellent bouncy without weighting you down. Neoprene quick drying Neolite fabric for hours of comfort on the water

WATER SPORTS– The Camo Cool Life Jacket provides a secure fit and all day comfort for boating and water sports alike. Keep your water adventures fun, safe and comfortable with this Type III USCG Approved Life Jacket

FAMILY FUN SINCE 1991 – The Airhead Sports Group is a family of watersports, wintersports, and leisure brands focused on creating quality fun promoting products. Our brands encourage kids and adults to get outdoors, be active, and, most importantly have FUN
product_description: The Airhead Camo Cool Pink life vest is made of lightweight, quick-drying materials and features oversized arm holes for freedom of movement. USCG approved Type III

name: Seachoice Life Vest, Type II Personal Flotation Device - USCG Approved - Multiple Sizes and Colors
short_description: U.S. Coast Guard Type II PFD
Fits adults 90 pounds and up, with 40 to 60 inch chest
Bright orange color provides enhanced visibility
Size: Extra Large
Color: Orange
Manufacturer Part Number: 50-85580
product_description: Designed to turn unconscious wearers face up, this U.S. Coast Guard approved Type II life vest features a polyester shell with PE foam filling. Suitable for adults 90 pounds and up, with chest size from 30 to 52 inches. Bright orange color provides enhanced visibility. Seachoice is committed to delivering quality marine accessories and OEM replacement parts to satisfy fishing, boating and watersports enthusiasts worldwide. Seachoice is run for and by boaters offering a wide-ranging product line while remaining affordable.

name: Sportstuff Type III Life Jacket US Coast Guard Approved Open Sides with 3 Body Belts & Buckles Quick Dry Fabric, Secure Fit, Comfortable Stars & Stripes
short_description: US Coast Guard Approved: This personal flotation device meets USCG requirements. Less bulky design for use when quick response is likely and offers a larger range of motion
Open Sided: Open sides allow for better ventilation to keep you cooler throughout the day. Designed for personal watercrafts and general boating safety
Buckles: Three body belts with buckles. Side release buckles open and close quickly to ensure safety and security on the water
Material: Soft UV and stain resistant 200-denier polyester shell with lightweight Poly-E flotation inside
Sizing: This life jacket follows the sizing determined by the USGC and is designed to fit adults that weigh over 90 pounds and have a 30-52-inch chest size

name: JKSPORTS Fly Fishing Vest - Fishing Safety Life Jacket for Swimming, Sailing, Boating, Kayak - Floating Multifunction Breathable Backpack for Men and Women - Adjustable, Grey/Green/Red/Blue
short_description: Crafted with a premium ripstop polyester shell and replaceable EPE foam inside for superior buoyancy. Inside zipper opening for convenient to take out the floating foam to be a super thin and breathable vest.
Low profile, paddle specific foam design Pockets designed for your essential gear Breathable mesh lower back Lash tab for small accessories
Four generous chest pocket, four zipped front pockets, two side mesh pocket, and one generous back pocket in total.
Accessory loops and attachment ladders on the chest invite custom attachments. Mesh on the back and mesh fabric inside deliver high breathability.
The product is guaranteed for two year.
product_description: This fishing jacket looks more like an outdoor vest with total 11 zippered pockets and multi attachment Ladders and accessory loops on its front and wide reflectors on the back and shoulder. Underneath the exterior it’s a fully functional flotation device which is detachable for functioning as a shear fishing gear carrier. And this vest will fit almost any person due to webbed adjustable buckle straps. If your main priority is gear storage, this fishing vest is one of a kind. It’s great for fly fishing, kayak fishing, canoe fishing (pretty much any type of fishing). EPE Foam Design Specifications: Color: Grey / Green / Red / Blue (Optional) Material: Polyester + EPE foam Max bearing: 95kg / 209.44lb Item flat size: 55 * 46cm / 21.65 * 18.1in Weight: 750g / 1.65lb Package size: 50 * 44 * 10cm / 19.69 * 17.32 * 3.94in Package weight: 780g / 1.71lb Mesh Design Specifications: Color: Grey / Green / Red / Blue (Optional) Material: Polyester + Mesh Item flat size: 55 * 46cm / 21.65 * 18.1in Weight: 563g / 1.24lb

name: O'Brien Men's Flex V-Back Life Jacket - US Coast Guard Approved Level 70 Buoyancy - Water Sports Activity Including Boating, Paddle, Skiing, Surfing & Swimming
short_description: ENHANCED BUOYANCY: The V-Flexback LTD life jackets is uniquely designed with an innovative foam core & constructed buoyancy panels, providing optimal flotation for any water sport activity

ADJUSTABLE FIT: The Flex V-Back LTD life jacket comes with with adjustable straps & buckles, allowing for a secure and comfortable fit. This ensures the vest stays in place during watersports, giving you unrestricted mobility & confidence in the water

RANGE OF MOTION: Designed to enable a full range of motion, the Flex V-Back LTD mens life vest is great for all types of water sports. Its lightweight & contoured shape allows for natural and fluid movement, enhancing your performance on the water.
PREMIUM MATERIALS: The O'Brien Flex V-Back LTD life jacket is crafted from Neoprene making it lightweight and are quick to dry.

US COAST GUARD APPROVED: Rest easy knowing that this life jacket is fully approved by the US Coast Guard as a Level 70 (Type III PFD), meeting stringent safety standards for all your aquatic activities.
product_description: From kayaking to jet skiing to swimming, enjoy the open water with the O'Brien Watersports Men's Flex V-Back Lightweight Life Jacket. Featuring a split V-back, this jacket moves with you. A large, zippered closure and 2 adjustable belts secure a nice and snug fit that comfortably hugs your body. Crafted from a soft, breathable, and eco-conscious material, this buoyancy aid offers flotation for men like no other.

name: ONYX General Purpose Coast Guard Approved Boating Life Jacket
short_description: Adjustable belts and chest strap to keep vest from riding up
Lightweight durable flotation foam
Large armholes for comfort
Open-sided styling
Bright colors to add visibility on the water
product_description: The Onyx General Purpose vest features classic open sided styling at an affordable price. Quick release buckles and 1" belts provide a secure fit. These vests are U.S. Coast Guard approved. Available in infant, child, youth, adult universal and adult oversize to outfit the entire family, and bright colors to add visibility on the water. The Adult Universal vest fits chest sizes of 30" - 52", and over 90 lbs and Oversize vest fits chest sizes of 40" - 60", and over 90 lbs.

name: HyperLite Men's Indy Life Jacket - US Coast Guard Approved Level 70 Buoyancy Aid, Great for Any Water Sports Activity Including Boating, Paddle & Swimming
short_description: IF IT ZIPS, IT FITS: This men's life jacket is designed for a snug, performance-ready fit. Neoprene naturally expands in water, so the vest may feel tight when dry—that’s intentional. A snug fit ensures the jacket stays secure and allows for confident, unrestricted movement in the water.

ENHANCED BUOYANCY: Our Hyperlite life jackets are uniquely designed with an innovative foam core & constructed buoyancy panels, providing optimal flotation for whatever water sport you’re getting into.

PREMIUM MATERIALS: Our adult life jackets are crafted from Biolite foam, Truefit Technology & Fluidflex Patterns that provide outstanding durability & longevity. Our life jackets are made with a biolite lightweight exterior and are quick to dry.

RANGE OF MOTION: Designed to enable a full range of motion, this mens life vest is ideal for all types of water sports. Its lightweight & contoured shape allows for natural and fluid movement, enhancing your performance on the water.
HYPERVENT TECHNOLOGY: This life jacket for adults is equipped with superior drainability and has temperature regulating technology that keeps you comfortable in and out of the water

name: Stohlquist Universal Fit Adult Life Jacket PFD (4 Pack) US Coast Guard Approved, Life Vest for Men and Women 90+ lbs, Lightweight Neoprene & Adjustable, Ideal for Boating, Kayaking & Water Sports.
short_description: US Coast Guard Approved - Certified by the US Coast Guard, these life jackets meet stringent safety standards, suitable for all your water activities. Whether boating, jet skiing, or simply enjoying a day on the water, you can trust in the reliable protection these vests offer.

Universal Size for Adults - Designed with a non-restrictive cut, our life vests accommodate a wide range of body types, making them ideal for both men and women. The adjustable straps ensure a perfect fit, providing comfort and security for various water sports.

PFD for Water Sports and Boating - These life vests are built from premium materials to last. Lightweight yet sturdy, they are perfect for extended use as PFD life jackets for adults, ensuring both safety and durability in demanding water environments. They are designed for water sports and have a non-restrictive cut with a slim back panel that reduces interference from boat seats and gear.

Enhanced Safety Features - The higher placement of the upper buckle helps reduce ride-up, ensuring a snug fit. This Coast Guard-approved life vest is perfect for PFD life jackets for adults and kayak life jacket use. These life vests are tailored to fit a range of body types with easily adjustable straps.

Experience Over 40 Years of Excellence - Stohlquist combines decades of innovation and expertise to craft premium quality PFD life jackets, designed for optimal safety and comfort in water sports such as boating, fishing, kayaking, and wakeboarding. Trust in our tradition to enhance your water adventures.

name: BLUESTORM Cirrus26 Inflatable PFD Life Jackets for Adults | US Coast Guard Approved Automatic Life Vest w/Manual Override Convertibility
short_description: US COAST GUARD-APPROVED TYPE V PFD: This USCG-approved Type 5 life jacket has Type 3 performance. This life vest inflates automatically upon water immersion via a replaceable CO2 cylinder (includes 1 cylinder with purchase) or manually with a pull of the “jerk to inflate” cord or back-up oral inflation tube.

VERSATILE & COMFORTABLE: Perfect for paddleboarding, fishing, sailing, kayaking, angling, boating, and other water activities. Internal spare CO2 cylinder pocket and accessory attachment point keeps gear secure.

LIGHTWEIGHT & COOL: This life preserver's ergonomic collar and mesh upper back strap are great for all-day comfort; the mesh back strap helps pull the collar down and away from the neck while the long shell design puts the secure waist belt in a lower, more comfortable position on the body.

MANUAL ONLY CONVERSION CAP: Easily locks into Manual Only inflation mode for times the PFD will be submerged in water (Duck Hunters, Dock and Shore Workers). Great for paddlers, waterfowl hunters, or where the vest may be submerged in a non-life-threatening situation.
2X HIGHER MINIMUM BUOYANCY: The Cirrus offers an outstanding 26 lbs of buoyancy, a 2.x higher rating than Type 3 foam vest life jackets.
product_description: US COAST GUARD-APPROVED TYPE V PFD: This USCG-approved Type 5 life jacket has Type 3 performance. This life vest inflates automatically upon water immersion via a replaceable CO2 cylinder (includes 1 cylinder with purchase) or manually with a pull of the “jerk to inflate” cord or back-up oral inflation tube.
